question_text: A user says their built-in laptop camera is not working. Which two troubleshooting steps are most appropriate?
answer_options: Update or reinstall the camera driver
Check camera settings in the BIOS/UEFI
Disable screen dimming in power options
correct_answer: Update or reinstall the camera driver
Check camera settings in the BIOS/UEFI
explanation: Driver issues or disabled BIOS camera settings are common causes for webcam failures.
